definition: to finish school, esp. a short course/to complete a course
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.chinese: 颁发结业证书，后续课程服务。

sentences.english: Newly trained female officers of the Afghan National Army sit at their graduation ceremony at the army's training center.
sentences.chinese: 军队培训中心，女军官在培训结业典礼上。

sentences.english: She won her licence in Physics in 1893.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了物理学结业证。

sentences.english: Completes the studies, may obtain the certificate of proficiency which the Shandong Province work hall issues.
sentences.chinese: 完成学业，可获山东省劳动厅颁发的结业证书。

sentences.english: The next year in 2006, Chiang Mai Tzu Chi School held its first graduation ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 清迈慈济学校并在2006年，举办首届结业典礼。

sentences.english: Dr Yuan graduated from Southwest Agriculture College.
sentences.chinese: 袁博士结业于西南农业大学。

sentences.english: In the diplomas shall be recorded the length of study and the subjects studied.
sentences.chinese: 结业证书应当载明修业年限和学业内容。

sentences.english: Final marks which will be available and sent to Universities in the week following closing ceremonies.
sentences.chinese: 期末成绩将会在结业典礼后马上寄往个大学。

sentences.english: Tianjin Nankai School in 1917 after graduation, studied in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 1917年天津南开学校结业后，留学日本。

sentences.english: Graduation in 1990, the Chinese Painting Department of China Academy of Fine Arts professional portraits.
sentences.chinese: 1990年结业于中国美术学院国画系人物画专业。

sentences.english: Second, competition among graduates grows more bitter and more bitter and bitter.
sentences.chinese: 第二，结业生之间的竞争日趋剧烈。

sentences.english: But what blew away everyone were LeBron's passing skills.
sentences.chinese: 但吹倒了，大家都是勒布朗的结业典礼技能。

sentences.english: I know that the passing out parade held today bears a special significance to the Immigration Department.
sentences.chinese: 今天举行的学员结业会操，对入境处具有特别的意义。

sentences.english: Please input the 6 digits ID number as receivers of the training summary, use ", " between 2 IDs.
sentences.chinese: 请输入结业总结收件人工号后6位，多人以，号分隔。

sentences.english: He delivered a speech on behalf of all the graduates on Graduation Day.
sentences.chinese: 结业典礼那天他代表全体毕业生发表了演讲。
